name: Rainslasher
r1: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 20%.
r2: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 24%.
r3: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 28%
r4: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 32%.
r5: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 36%.
